extensionDescription.message: LinkedIn Container izolira vašo dejavnost na LinkedInu od preostale spletne dejavnosti, s čimer LinkedInu prepreči, da bi vas spremljal izven spletnega mesta LinkedIn preko piškotkov tretjih oseb.
extensionDescription.description: Description of the extension. DO NOT TRANSLATE "LinkedIn Container".

in-fbc-subhead.description: This is shown at the top of the panel pop-up when the user is on a LinkedIn website, which has been automatically opened into LinkedIn Container. DO NOT TRANSLATE "LinkedIn Container".

in-fbc-p1.message: LinkedIn vam lahko odslej na tej strani sledi. Da odstranite to stran iz LinkedIn Containerja, izberite "Strani, dovoljene v LinkedIn Containerju" in jo odstranite s seznama.

on-facebook-subhead.message: Na LinkedInu in straneh v LinkedIn Containerju
on-facebook-subhead.description: This is shown at the top of the panel pop-up when the user is on a LinkedIn website, which has been automatically opened into LinkedIn Container. DO NOT TRANSLATE "LinkedIn Container".

on-facebook-p1.message: Ta ikona se pojavi v Firefoxovi naslovni vrstici, ko obiščete LinkedInove strani ali strani, ki ste jih dodali v LinkedIn Container.
on-facebook-p1.description: This is shown in the body of the panel pop-up when the user is on a LinkedIn website, which has been automatically opened into LinkedIn Container. DO NOT TRANSLATE "LinkedIn Container".

on-facebook-p2.message: Te strani potrebujejo dostop do vaše identitete na LinkedInu (vedeti morajo, kdo ste), da bi lahko delovale. To pomeni tudi, da lahko LinkedIn sledi vaši dejavnosti na teh straneh.
on-facebook-p2.description: This is shown in the body of the panel pop up when the user is on LinkedIn.

notOnLinkedInHeader.description: This is shown at the top of the panel pop-up when the user is NOT on a LinkedIn website, which has been automatically opened OUTSIDE LinkedIn Container. DO NOT TRANSLATE "LinkedIn Container".

notOnLinkedInText.message: Ta stran je izven LinkedIn Containerja. To LinkedInu otežuje sledenje vaši spletni dejavnosti.
notOnLinkedInText.description: This is shown in the body of the panel pop-up when the user is NOT on a LinkedIn website, which has been automatically opened OUTSIDE LinkedIn Container. DO NOT TRANSLATE "LinkedIn Container".

onUnknownSiteHeader.message: Ta stran ni v LinkedIn Containerju.
onUnknownSiteHeader.description: This is shown at the top of the panel pop-up when the user is on an "unknown" website - e.g., about:newtab. DO NOT TRANSLATE "LinkedIn Container".

facebookContainer.description: This is the name of the extension, and appears at the top of all onboarding panels. Please do not translate "LinkedIn Container".

onboarding1-subhead.description: This is the subhead of onboarding panel 1. Please do not translate "LinkedIn Container"

onboarding1-p1.message: LinkedIn lahko sledi vašemu brskanju tudi izven strani LinkedIn.com. LinkedInova gumba Všeč mi je in Deli lahko spremljata vašo dejavnost tudi, če ju ne uporabljate.
onboarding1-p1.description: This is the first paragraph of onboarding panel 1. Please do not translate "LinkedIn Container"

onboarding1-p2.message: LinkedIn Container ustvari mejo med LinkedInovimi stranmi in preostalim spletom, kar LinkedInu oteži sledenje vaši spletni dejavnosti.

onboarding2-subhead.message: Na LinkedInu in straneh v LinkedIn Containerju
onboarding2-subhead.description: This is the subhead for the second onboarding panel. Please do not translate "LinkedIn Container"

onboarding2-alt.description: This is alternative text for the icon in the second onboarding panel

onboarding2-p1.message: Ta ikona se pojavi v naslovni vrstici Firefoxa, ko obiščete strani, kot je LinkedIn.com, ki so v LinkedIn Containerju.
onboarding2-p1.description: This is the first paragraph of the second onboarding panel.

onboarding2-p2.message: Te strani potrebujejo dostop do vaše identitete na LinkedInu (vedeti morajo, kdo ste), da bi lahko delovale. To pomeni tudi, da lahko LinkedIn sledi vaši dejavnosti na teh straneh.
onboarding2-p2.description: This is the second paragraph of the second onboarding panel. Please do not translate "LinkedIn Container"

onboarding4-subhead.description: This is the subhead for the fourth onboarding panel.

onboarding4-p1.message: Tudi ko niste na LinkedInu, vas lahko LinkedIn spremlja na spletu. Gumbi, ki omogočajo objavo stvari na LinkedInu ali prijavo na spletna mesta z uporabo računa LinkedIn, vsebujejo sledilce. LinkedIn Container bo blokiral te sledilce in prikazal ikono ograje, da vam pokaže, kje so bili sledilci odstranjeni.
onboarding4-p1.description: This is the first paragraph of the fourth onboarding panel.

onboarding4-img.message: Ta slika prikazuje, kako se ikona ograje LinkedIn Containerja prikaže ob LinkedInovem gumbu Všeč mi je.
onboarding4-img.description: This is alternative text for the image shown in the fourth onboarding panel.

onboarding5-subhead.message: Prijava s LinkedInom na drugih spletnih mestih
onboarding5-subhead.description: This is the subhead for the fifth onboarding panel.

onboarding5-p1.message: Če želite uporabljati LinkedIn za prijavo na drugih straneh, jih boste morali premakniti v vsebnik. Kliknite ikono ograje in na dnu izberite "Dovoli stran v LinkedIn Containerju".
onboarding5-p1.description: This is the first paragraph of the fifth onboarding panel.

onboarding5-img.message: Ta slika prikazuje, kako se bo gumb za dodajanje spletnega mesta v LinkedIn Container prikazal na plošči.
onboarding5-img.description: This is alternative text for the image shown in the fifth onboarding panel.

onboarding5-p2.message: S tem bo omogočena prijava s LinkedInom, vendar bo LinkedIn lahko sledil vaši dejavnosti na tej strani.
onboarding5-p2.description: This is the second paragraph on the fifth onboarding panel.

btn-allow.description: This is a button to allows users to whitelist the domain, adding it to the LinkedIn container.

btn-cancel.description: This is a button to cancel out of the onboarding panel.

btn-next.description: This is a button to continue to the next onboarding panel.

btn-back.description: This is a button that returns the user to the previous onboarding panel.

btn-done.description: This is a button the user clicks to close out the panel when they have finished reading the text.

btn-arrow-back.description: This is alternative text for the back arrow button.

btn-arrow-forward.message: Pojdi na Kako deluje LinkedIn Container
btn-arrow-forward.description: This is alternative text for the arrow icon next to the "How LinkedIn Container Works" link

no-trackers-p1.message: LinkedIn Container na tej strani ni zaznal nobenih LinkedInovih sledilcev. Kljub temu pa lahko stran vsebuje druge vrste sledilcev.

learn-more.description: This is a link that opens a page with more information about LinkedIn Container.

how-fbc-works.description: This is a button that opens the LinkedIn Container onboarding flow.

trackers-detected-subhead.description: This is a subhead, and it means that the add on has protected the user by blocking LinkedIn trackers.

trackers-detected-p1.message: LinkedInovi gumbi, ki se pojavljajo na različnih straneh (kot so spletne trgovine, portali z novicami ...), vsebujejo sledilce, ki LinkedInu sporočajo vašo dejavnost na spletu. Tudi če teh gumbov nikoli ne uporabljate, lahko sledilci zbirajo podatke o vašem brskanju. LinkedIn Container te sledilce zavrača.

trackers-detected-p2.message: LinkedIn Container zavrača te sledilce. Če pa kliknete na kateregakoli od teh gumbov, vam bo LinkedIn lahko sledil.

trackers-detected-fence-alt.description: This is alternative text describing the container fence icon.

sites-included.description: This is a header for the list of websites that are in the LinkedIn Container by default. Capitalized letters are preferred if that makes sense/is feasible for the language.

no-sites-added.description: This message is shown beneath the 'SITES YOU’VE ALLOWED' list header when no sites have been added to the contaner.

sites-allowed.description: This is the header for the list of sites the user has manually added into the LinkedIn Container. Capitalized letters are preferred if that makes sense/is feasible for the lanaguage.

sites-added-p1.message: LinkedIn Container ustvari mejo za LinkedInove strani. V to mejo lahko dodate tudi druge strani, vendar bo to LinkedInu omogočilo, da lahko bolje spremlja vaše brskanje po spletu.

button-allow-site.description: Button text that allows sites to be added to the LinkedIn Container

button-remove-site.description: Button text that removes an already-added site from the LinkedIn Container to the default container

button-remove-site-tooltip.message: Ker je to spletno mesto v lasti LinkedIna, ga ni mogoče odstraniti iz LinkedIn Containerja.
button-remove-site-tooltip.description: Tooltip that is displayed when hovering over the remove site button

remove-site-p1.message: Če odstranite to stran iz LinkedIn Containerja, možnost prijave z računom LinkedIn ne bo več delovala, LinkedInovi sledilni piškotki pa bodo izbrisani.

remove-site-p2.message: Če želite ponovno uporabiti možnost prijave z računom LinkedIn, boste morali stran dodati nazaj v LinkedIn Container.

add-site-subhead.message: Dovolite LinkedInu, da vam sledi na tej strani?

add-site-p1.message: S tem bo omogočena prijava s LinkedInom, vendar bo LinkedIn lahko sledil vaši dejavnosti na tej strani.

inPageUI-tooltip-button-share.message: LinkedIn Container je onemogočil ta gumb in preprečil LinkedInu, da bi spremljal vaš obisk te strani.

inPageUI-tooltip-button-login.message: LinkedIn Container je zavrnil LinkedInove sledilce. Če na tej strani za prijavo uporabljate račun LinkedIn, vam bo LinkedIn lahko sledil.

inPageUI-tooltip-prompt-p1.message: Dovolite LinkedInu, da vas spremlja na tej strani?

inPageUI-tooltip-prompt-p2.message: Če želite uporabiti možnost prijave z računom LinkedIn, bo LinkedIn lahko spremljal vašo dejavnost na tej strani. To lahko LinkedInu pomaga, da si ustvari popolnejšo sliko o vašem spletnem življenju.

inPageUI-tooltip-button-share-passive.message: Če kliknete ta gumb, bo LinkedIn lahko spremljal vaš obisk te strani.

inPageUI-tooltip-button-email.message: Če boste tukaj uporabili svoj pravi e-poštni naslov, vam bo LinkedIn morda lahko sledil. Kliknite, če želite izvedeti več.

inPageUI-tooltip-email-prompt-p1.message: Dovolite LinkedInu, da vam sledi na tej strani?

inPageUI-tooltip-email-prompt-p2.message: To spletno mesto lahko vaš e-poštni naslov deli s LinkedInom, kar slednjemu omogoča, da vam sledi. Za skritje svojega pravega e-poštnega naslova lahko uporabite storitev, kot je Firefox Relay.
